Environment.Description: Name of the environment to launch these VPCs into.
Environment.ConstraintDescription: Can contain 4 to 8 lower case alphanumeric characters.

TemplateURLPrefix.Description: Template URL prefix for nested stacks.

AvailabilityZones.Description: AvailabilityZones to launch networking stacks into.

NATImageId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid ami id

BastionImageId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid ami id

NTPImageId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid ami id
